attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever used! I heard so many good things about it so I decided to get it to support Trump, obviously, and my phone was glitching so bad. I couldn’t figure out why so I deleted the app and the glitching stopped. I DO NOT recommend this app! It will mess with your phone.

attributes.title: NOT MY PRESIDENT
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app, I wanted to support my lovely sempai. The opposite happened. I got on, and a bunch of fire ants preceded to crawl out of my phone and into my mouth. Is this how you repay me for my undying love sempai?! Fine, I got the message. WAIT, maybe this is a secret message that’s telling me to join the blm movement!! THANK YOU SEMPAI, I GOTT THE MESSAGEE!!! I WONT LET YOU DOWN!!

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: Was one of the worst apps I’ve ever used . Literally the app wouldn’t even work for me and I could not get it to function . Every time I tried to open the app the screen would turn white and make my phone shut off . Ugh I’m so annoyed ):

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: When I got this app it killed my computer. And it was very rude to my lamp. It even   decided to break my room and my car. And don’t even get me started on how it ate all of my food, very disrespectful. It even disrespected my door. All in all this is the worst app you can get and it’s very disrespectful.

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: this app took weeks to download, and i couldn’t do anything on my phone while it was downloading. after it downloaded, my phone started to glitch. all i saw on my feed on instagram and snapchat was pictures of trump too, it’s like someone hacked my phone🧐. i wasn’t able to use other apps on my phone. the app told me i wasn’t old enough after downloading it either😔 i just wanted to support mr. cheeto god🟠😳, but since this dumb app doesn’t work, i guess i can’t!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app took days for it to download and when i try opening it, it closes back down its a bad app don’t get it. It almost blew up my phone after i tried opening it a couple times. my phone over heated and i had to take it to the apple store. NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: The app made my phone glitch and I couldn’t do anything with it. Wits completely useless and just doesn’t work the way it’s supposed to. There is no point in it even being on the App Store when it’s this glitchy

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: if i could give this app 0 stars i would!! app took weeks to download with my perfectly good wifi and then it glitched my entire phone and gave it a horrible virus!! do not download this if you don’t want to pay 200 dollars to fix your phone!

attributes.title: seriously??
attributes.review:
i downloaded the app with hopes of finding out crucial information about the trump
administration so i can further support them. the app took 7 weeks to download, every time i open the app it crashes AND the app should a pop up that cursed me out. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: THEY WATCH YOU
attributes.review: I was using thaw app when my camera was flashing and then a video of me from a few minutes ago popped up on the screen for a few seconds and then went away as my camera kept flashing until I got off the app.
